featured.text: The 60 pilot whales swam ashore as a result of (A) a large winter storm off the coast of Cape Cod. (B) a behavior currently unknown to scientists.
The pilot whales died on the beaches of Cape Cod due to (A) the lack of salt water to facilitate their respiration.
These seagoing mammals are among the lucky survivors of a whale-stranding last December at Cape Cod.

definition.zh_def: 披肩，斗篷；一種無袖的外衣，通常覆蓋肩部和背部。
definition.en_def: A sleeveless outer garment that drapes over the shoulders and back.
definition.example: She wore a beautiful red cape that flowed behind her as she walked.
